metadata.title: CVE-2021-47287 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:driver core: auxiliary bus: Fix memory leak when driver_register() failIf driver_register() returns with error we need to free the memoryallocated for auxdrv->driver.name before returning from__auxiliary_driver_register()

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
